title: Karvy ex-CEO Amitabh Chaturvedi weighs buyouts to make Purple a small finance bank - Moneycontrol
content: Karvy ex-CEO Amitabh Chaturvedi weighs buyouts to make Purple a small finance bank  Moneycontrol
description: Chaturvedi is aiming at multiple acquisitions in the space of financial services both for attaining the size of business as well as for listing on bourses
